verses.verse: וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed יוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3124><s%> Then Jonah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> his God מִמְּעֵ֖י <S%H4578><s%> belly הַדָּגָֽה׃ <S%H1710><s%> out of the fish's

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said קָ֠רָאתִי <S%H7121><s%> I cried מִצָּ֥רָה <S%H6869><s%> by reason of mine affliction לִ֛י אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> and he heard מִבֶּ֧טֶן <S%H990><s%> me out of the belly שְׁא֛וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of hell שִׁוַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7768><s%> cried שָׁמַ֥עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> I [and] thou heardest קוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> my voice

וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤נִי <S%H7993><s%> For thou hadst cast מְצוּלָה֙ <S%H4688><s%> me into the deep בִּלְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> in the midst יַמִּ֔ים <S%H3220><s%> of the seas וְנָהָ֖ר <S%H5104><s%> and the floods יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי <S%H5437><s%> compassed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ <S%H4867><s%> me about all thy billows וְגַלֶּ֖יךָ <S%H1530><s%> and thy waves עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> over עָבָֽרוּ׃ <S%H5674><s%> passed over

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Then I said נִגְרַ֖שְׁתִּי <S%H1644><s%> I am cast out מִנֶּ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> from עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> of thy sight אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless אוֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> again לְהַבִּ֔יט <S%H5027><s%> yet I will look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הֵיכַ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> temple קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> toward thy holy

אֲפָפ֤וּנִי <S%H661><s%> compassed me about מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> The waters עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to the point נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [even] to the soul תְּה֖וֹם <S%H8415><s%> the depth יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי <S%H5437><s%> closed me round about ס֖וּף <S%H5488><s%> the weeds חָב֥וּשׁ <S%H2280><s%> were wrapped about לְרֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> my head

לְקִצְבֵ֤י <S%H7095><s%> to the bottoms הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains יָרַ֔דְתִּי <S%H3381><s%> I went down הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth בְּרִחֶ֥יהָ <S%H1280><s%> with her bars בַעֲדִ֖י <S%H1157><s%> around לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> [was] about me for ever וַתַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> yet hast thou brought up מִשַּׁ֛חַת <S%H7845><s%> from corruption חַיַּ֖י <S%H2416><s%> my life יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֤ף <S%H5848><s%> fainted עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> When נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> When my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God זָכָ֑רְתִּי <S%H2142><s%> within me I remembered וַתָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> came in אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> and תְּפִלָּתִ֔י <S%H8605><s%> and my prayer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֵיכַ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> temple קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> unto thee into thine holy
מְשַׁמְּרִ֖ים <S%H8104><s%> They that observe הַבְלֵי־ <S%H1892><s%> vanities שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> lying חַסְדָּ֖ם <S%H2617><s%> their own mercy יַעֲזֹֽבוּ׃ <S%H5800><s%> forsake

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I בְּק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto thee with the voice תּוֹדָה֙ <S%H8426><s%> of thanksgiving אֶזְבְּחָה־ <S%H2076><s%> But I will sacrifice לָּ֔ךְ אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָדַ֖רְתִּי <S%H5087><s%> [that] that I have vowed אֲשַׁלֵּ֑מָה <S%H7999><s%> I will pay יְשׁוּעָ֖תָה <S%H3444><s%> Salvation לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [is] of the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לַדָּ֑ג <S%H1709><s%> unto the fish וַיָּקֵ֥א <S%H6958><s%> and it vomited out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3124><s%> Jonah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> onto הַיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H3004><s%> upon the dry פ
